model

Class Transfer

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Transfer

  • @Entity
public class Transfer
extends java.lang.Object
    Model class for Transfers. Used in the creation of the database table for Transfers through Hibernate.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Transfer()
      Constructor to create transfers without parameters.
      Transfer(java.lang.String description, Category category, boolean income, java.sql.Date date, float amount)
      Constructor to create transfers

                java.sql.Date date,

        Constructor to create transfers
        Parameters:
        description - String describing what the transfer is
        category - Category to which the transfer belongs
        income - boolean whether the transfer is income or not
        date - Date on which the transfer was made
        amount - float the amount of money transferred
